properties.areaDesc: Northern Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Central Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 10 at 2:08PM CST until February 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4
inches possible, locally higher in the mountains.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Eddy County Plains,
Northern Lea, and Central Lea.

* WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility.
The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For Eddy County plains the western parts of
the county are the most favored to received accumulating snow.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
